Functions
00030_HMAC_SHA1
Secure_API_Crypto_Algorithms

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_VerifyHiThere ()
 
 TestCase_BC00101_VerifyHiThere ()

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection
  4. Trusted Application TlIntegrationTest
    1. Trusted Application copied to Android on Test device in registry as 05010000000000000000000000000000.trst
    2. Trusted Application runnable and bug-free

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_VerifyHiThere ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Focus:
TLC makes Trusted Application call and test HMAC SHA-1 verify.
Test Steps:
key = 0x0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b
key_len = 20
data = "Hi There"
data_len = 8 bytes
digest = 0x9294727a3638bb1c13f48ef8158bfc9d
See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2202
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
Secure_API_Crypto_Algorithms.00030_HMAC_SHA1.GC00100_VerifyHiThere

TestCase_GC00102_SignWithData ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
call tlApiSignatureInit(..) to set key, mode and algorithm TLAPI_ALG_HMAC_SHA1
call tlApiSignatureSign(..) passing a 8-byte message to calculate the signature.
Test Steps:
TLC makes Trusted Application call and test HMAC SHA1 sign.
Key = 0x46, 0xb7, 0xce, 0xf9, 0x1a, 0xdf, 0x3b, 0xe4, 0x6b, 0x7c, 0xef
Data = 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01
HMAC-SHA-1 = 0a80770f7ad6005d1e7f8e1abdfd36c778c9679d Function returns TLAPI_OK.
Test output is OK. Signature is checked against the expected value.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
Secure_API_Crypto_Algorithms.00030_HMAC_SHA1.GC00102_SignWithData
TestCase_GC00103_SignWithEmptyData ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
call tlApiSignatureInit(..) to set key, mode and algorithm TLAPI_ALG_HMAC_SHA1
call tlApiSignatureSign(..) passing an empty message (length=0) to calculate the signature.
Test Steps:
TLC makes Trusted Application call and test HMAC SHA1 sign.
Key = 00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF 0123456789ABCDEF0011223344556677 8899AABBCCDDEEFF0123456789ABCDEF 00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF
Data = "" (empty string)
HMAC-SHA-1 = 1F25DAE40F16D60661045807F9CD0243F28174F7 Function returns TLAPI_OK.
Test output is OK. Signature is checked against the expected value.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:

TestCase_GC00104_SignWithDataA ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
call tlApiSignatureInit(..) to set key, mode and algorithm TLAPI_ALG_HMAC_SHA1
call tlApiSignatureSign(..) passing the one byte message "a" to calculate the signature.
Test Steps:
TLC makes Trusted Application call and test HMAC SHA1 sign.
Key = 00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF 0123456789ABCDEF0011223344556677 8899AABBCCDDEEFF0123456789ABCDEF 00112233445566778899AABBCCDDEEFF
Data = "a"
HMAC-SHA-1 = 855A6A3A320BC4628DEF1F799CDF734508EF5867 Function returns TLAPI_OK.
Test output is OK. Signature is checked against the expected value.
Manual Execution:
No

TestCase_GC00106_SignWith64BytesKey ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
call tlApiSignatureInit(..) to set key, mode and algorithm TLAPI_ALG_HMAC_SHA1
call tlApiSignatureSign(..) passing the one byte message "a" to calculate the signature.
Test Steps:
TLC makes Trusted Application call and test HMAC SHA1 sign (16 bytes data) with 64 bytes length of data (blocksize). Function returns TLAPI_OK.
Test output is OK. Signature is checked against the expected value.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes

Yes

Secure_API_Crypto_Algorithms.00030_HMAC_SHA1.GC00106_SignWith64BytesKey
TestCase_GC00107_SignWith65BytesKey ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
call tlApiSignatureInit(..) to set key, mode and algorithm TLAPI_ALG_HMAC_SHA1
call tlApiSignatureSign(..) passing the one byte message "a" to calculate the signature.
Test Steps:
TLC makes Trusted Application call and test HMAC SHA1 sign (16 bytes data) with 65 bytes length of data (blocksize). If length(key) > 64, then hash of key is is used as key Function returns TLAPI_OK.
Test output is OK. Signature is checked against the expected value.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
Secure_API_Crypto_Algorithms.00030_HMAC_SHA1.GC00107_SignWith65BytesKey
